Claim: "The World Coal Association disputed the conclusion that stopping global warming calls for an end of coal use"
Implication: "Ending coal use is not necessary to stop global warming"
Referring expressions: The World Coal Association, global warming, coal use  Ending coal use, global warming
Formula: (exists c (exists b (IsDisputed(b) and IsEnded(c))) & (forall f (forall e (  IsEnded(e) ->  IsNotNecessary(f)))) & (forall g (forall h ( IsNotNecessary(g) ->   IsEnded(h)))) & (forall j (forall i (  IsEnded(i) ->   IsStopped(j))))) -> (exists d (exists a (IsNotNecessary(d) and IsStopped(a))))
